co.cask.cdap.api.common
Class RuntimeArguments

java.lang.Object
  co.cask.cdap.api.common.RuntimeArguments

public final class RuntimeArguments
extends Object

Utility class to convert String array to Map.

NO_ARGUMENTS

public static final Map<String,String> NO_ARGUMENTS
Method Detail

fromPosixArray

public static Map<String,String> fromPosixArray(String[] args)
Converts a POSIX compliant program argument array to a String-to-String Map.

Parameters:
args - Array of Strings where each element is a POSIX compliant program argument (Ex: "--os=Linux" ).
Returns:
Map of argument Keys and Values (Ex: Key = "os" and Value = "Linux").

toPosixArray

public static String[] toPosixArray(Map<String,String> kvMap)
Converts a String-to-String Map to POSIX compliant program argument array.

Parameters:
kvMap - Map of argument Keys and Values.
Returns:
Array of Strings in POSIX compliant format.

toPosixArray

public static String[] toPosixArray(Iterable<Map.Entry<String,String>> iterable)
Converts a Iterable of Map.Entry to a POSIX compliant program argument array.

Parameters:
iterable - of Map.Entry of argument Key and Value.
Returns:
Array of Strings in POSIX compliant format.

extractScope

public static Map<String,String> extractScope(Scope scope,
                                              String name,
                                              Map<String,String> arguments)
Extract all arguments for a given scope.

Parameters:
scope - The type of the scope
name - The name of the scope, e.g. "myTable"
arguments - the runtime arguments of the enclosing scope
Returns:
a map that contains only the keys that start with <scope>.<name>., with that prefix removed.

extractPrefix

public static Map<String,String> extractPrefix(String prefix,
                                               Map<String,String> arguments)
Extract all arguments that start with a prefix, and removes that prefix.

Parameters:
prefix - The prefix to filter and remove
arguments - the runtime arguments to extract from
Returns:
a map that contains only the keys that start with the prefix, with the prefix removed.

addScope

public static Map<String,String> addScope(Scope scope,
                                          String name,
                                          Map<String,String> arguments)
Add a scope prefix to all arguments.

Parameters:
scope - The type of the scope
name - The name of the scope, e.g. "myTable"
arguments - the runtime arguments to be scoped
Returns:
a map that contains all keys, prefixed with with <scope>.<name>.
